category.name: Substance Compliance IMDS Integration
category.category_description: Teamcenter Preferences for Substance Compliance International Material Data System (IMDS) Integration

preference.name: IMDS_MDS_Internal_Release_Permitted_groups
preference.preference_description: Indicates the groups allowed to internally release MDS (Material Data Sheet) in the International Material Data System (IMDS). Valid values are the group internal names. There is no default value.
